#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Main application runner

print('=== MULTI-FILE PYTHON WEB APPLICATION DEMO ===')
print()

# Import our custom modules (they should be available in the session)
try:
    from models import Database, User, Post
    from utils import Logger, json_response
    from api import UserAPI, PostAPI
    print('‚úì All modules imported successfully')
except ImportError as e:
    print(f'‚úó Module import failed: {e}')
    print('Make sure all files were saved to the session')
    exit(1)

print()
print('=== INITIALIZING APPLICATION ===')

# Create database and APIs
db = Database()
user_api = UserAPI(db)
post_api = PostAPI(db)
logger = Logger('MainApp')

logger.info('Application initialized')

print()
print('=== TESTING USER CREATION ===')

# Create some users
user1_response = user_api.create_user({
    'username': 'alice',
    'email': 'alice@example.com'
})
print('User 1 created:')
print(user1_response)

user2_response = user_api.create_user({
    'username': 'bob',
    'email': 'bob@example.com'
})
print('\nUser 2 created:')
print(user2_response)

print()
print('=== TESTING POST CREATION ===')

# Create some posts
post1_response = post_api.create_post({
    'title': 'My First Post',
    'content': 'This is the content of my first post. Hello world!',
    'author_id': 1
})
print('Post 1 created:')
print(post1_response)

post2_response = post_api.create_post({
    'title': 'Python is Awesome',
    'content': 'I love coding in Python. It\'s so clean and readable!',
    'author_id': 1
})
print('\nPost 2 created:')
print(post2_response)

post3_response = post_api.create_post({
    'title': 'Learning Docker',
    'content': 'Docker containers make development so much easier.',
    'author_id': 2
})
print('\nPost 3 created:')
print(post3_response)

print()
print('=== TESTING DATA RETRIEVAL ===')

# Get user posts
alice_posts = post_api.get_user_posts(1)
print('Alice\'s posts:')
print(alice_posts)

bob_posts = post_api.get_user_posts(2)
print('\nBob\'s posts:')
print(bob_posts)

print()
print('=== TESTING ERROR HANDLING ===')

# Test invalid user creation
invalid_user = user_api.create_user({
    'username': '',
    'email': 'invalid-email'
})
print('Invalid user creation:')
print(invalid_user)

# Test post creation with non-existent author
invalid_post = post_api.create_post({
    'title': 'Invalid Post',
    'content': 'This should fail',
    'author_id': 999
})
print('\nInvalid post creation:')
print(invalid_post)

print()
print('=== APPLICATION SUMMARY ===')
print(f'Total users: {len(db.users)}')
print(f'Total posts: {len(db.posts)}')
print('\n‚úÖ Multi-file Python application demo completed!')
print('\nüîÑ All files persist within this container session')
print('üóëÔ∏è  Files will be cleaned up when container restarts')
print('üîí Host system remains completely isolated')
